name: Space Fight (cambryx)
description:
The biggest battle in the history of this galaxy.. … and your ship keeps damaging itself!

You (the best pilot of all time) are fighting against an army of spaceships. Fortunately your ship has a very powerful weapon. The big problem: Using it damages your ship.

Controls

Arrow Keys to move

Space to shoot

Credits

This game was created in 72 hours during the Ludum Dare 43 gamejam.

It was developed  by Felix Schulz and Magnus Menger.

You can find a link to the entry here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/43/spacefight
